source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 6,021 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 277,919 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 3,242 Agility and absorbing 1.4 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
High Scholar's Grand Staff
